1.content:
You are sitting around in the library, hoping for something to distract you from this assignment. Why did you choose to study Education anyway? Out of the blue, you begin to feel light headed. Nothing new to you, you’re probably just studying to hard. You begin to pack away your laptop, charger and notes when the room begins to spin and you black out.

Coming to, your eyes jolt back and forth across the room. You understand you’re in the library, but everything is much, much bigger then it used to be. You look up to see a guy walking past to head downstairs. Wait, can it be? Have I shrunk? But why?

Without anytime to think, you look up to see...
1.title: Welcome to University.

13.content:
You look up to see a friend of yours, and it looks like he wants a seat.

Who is it?

James, 19, tall, skinny but muscular, brown hair, green eyes, has a nice semi flat ass and has huge feet. He studies Engineering, this is his 2nd year. Socially awkward at times.

Stan, 18, average height, kinda built, brown hair, brown eyes, beautiful bubble butt and average feet. He studies Veteran Science, this is his 1st year. Kinda dumb, but very loyal.

Rhys, 18, average height, skinny, blond hair, blue eyes, a nice butt. average feet. He studies Exercise Physiology, this is his 1st year. Loves his Cricket A true Australian bogan.

Nate, 20, tall, skinny, blond hair, blue eyes, a flat butt, small feet. he studies Photography, this is his 3rd and final year. He is very down to earth, you and him aren’t on the best terms.

Jim, 34, average height, dad bod, black hair, green eyes, average feet. He works at the University, running some sort of club.
13.title: Your Friend

133.content:
You sigh in relief, you thank heavens that at least it’s someone you know. You frantically wave your arms and scream in an attempt to be found by Rhys.

At least you knew Rhys unlike most people at this university. He was in an physical therapy class you took last semester. He’d go on and on about cricket. The dude could seriously never get enough of it.

Oh no, your brain wandered off on some tangent. You snap back into reality realising your cry’s for help went unheard. Of course you had to pick one of the few comfy seats in the library. Those seats are prime butt realestate and Rhy’s butt seems to be renting this chair for the foreseeable future. Without hesitation you attempt to make a mad dash for the back of the chair, hoping not to get crushed under the weight of this man. You were 1 step into your sprint when Rhy’s came crashing down, ass and all. The practically felt the air wheeze out of your lungs.

To make matters worse you happened to be be perfectly aligned with Rhy’s asscrack upon the point of impact. Yes you did this his butt looked sexy and all, but you didn’t want to be stuck between his two sweaty ass cheeks.
133.title: Rhys

choices: Are stuck to the bottom of his shoe
14.content:
You see someone’s runner coming straight for you, and it appears to be attached to a guys foot. It looks like he wants to tie his laces. You can barely react when it hits you, crushing your small body under his weight. You attempt to scream through the soggy gum stuck to the bottom of his shoe.

If you had one thing to be thankful for it’s the fact that you were sitting on a soft cushion. The man finishes tying his laces and proceeds to leave the library. You...
14.title: The Mighty Shoe

info.brief_description: You are a guy, living his life as a student when you shrink. How will the story play out?
info.description:
Your name is Dylan, you are a 19 year old university student. You are surrounded by your friends almost all the time. Today you were sitting in the university library trying to cram for an assignment when you begin to feel strange when you suddenly shrink.

Rules

1. This is a man only story, no female characters that involve any form of macrophilia

2. Please keep the vore at a minimum.

3. Dylan can not die. The shrinking somehow made his body morphable. It will always come back to it’s current shape.

4. If you regrow back, be sure to shrink yourself quickly.
